AdfPipelineReference.description: The reference to an Azure Data Factory Pipeline.

name.description: The name of the Azure Data Factory Pipeline.

inputName.description: The name of the input parameter of the Azure Data Factory Pipeline.

AdfPipelines.description: The definition of a set of Azure Data Factory pipelines.

names.description: A collection of names of the pipelines. For each pipeline name, max of 140 characters, must start with letter, number, or underscore and not contain ".", "+", "?", "/", "<", ">", "*", "%", "&", ":", "\".

armTemplateFileLink.description: The path to pipelines ARM template file.

armParametersFileLink.description: The path to pipelines ARM parameters file.

activities.description: A collection of paths to activities.

BaseResource.description: The base properties of all resources by this resource provider.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

BaseResourceProperties.description: The base properties of all Azure resource properties.

deletionProtectionStatus.description: Whether the resource is protected from deletion.

notificationEmails.description: A collection of notification emails for the resource.

values.description: The last operation for the resource was accepted for an asynchronous operation.
The last operation for the resource was cancelled before completion.
The last operation for the resource did not complete successfully.
The resource is ready for use.
The resource is swapping active slots.

BaseUpdateProperties.description: The definition of properties in a patch request.

deletionProtectionStatus.description: Whether the resource is protected from deletion.

notificationEmails.description: A collection of notification emails for the resource.

configurations.description: The configuration used in the code to find various resources.

DataType.description: The definition of a data type.

adfPipelineReference.description: The Azure Data Factory pipeline that produces the data type.

dataFamilyId.description: The id of the data family that this data type belongs to.

descriptors.description: A collection of descriptors that can describe inventory items of this data type. The collection can also include a friendly name for the main descriptor which can be used as an alternative in Get operations.

friendlyDescriptorName.description: The friendly name of the main descriptor that can be used in Get operations instead of the collection of descriptors.

mainDescriptor.description: The main descriptor of this data type.

name.description: The name of the data type. Built-in data type names "adhoc" and "activity_output" are not allowed.

Experiment.description: The definition of a DevAI Experiment.

properties.description: The properties associated with this experiment.

ExperimentListResult.description: The result of a request to list a resource.

value.description: The list of resources. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list.

dataTypes.description: The collection of data types defined in this Experiment. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

pipelinesInfo.description: The information of the Azure Data Factory pipelines. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

batchJobCommand.description: The batch job command line. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

machinePools.description: The Batch VM Pools the experiment will create, own, and use . If it's not specified, the shared machine pool created at the parent is used. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

ExperimentUpdateProperties.description: The definition of properties for Experiment patch requests.

dataTypes.description: The collection of data types defined in this Experiment. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

pipelinesInfo.description: The collection of data types defined in this Experiment. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

batchJobCommand.description: The batch job command line. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

machinePools.description: The Batch VM Pools the experiment will create, own, and use . If it's not specified, the shared machine pool created at the parent is used. This will be ignored if the experiment is a built-in experiment. The built-in experiment names are "Source" and "DataProvider".

ExperimentUpdateRequest.description: A patch request definition to update an Experiment.

properties.description: The properties the experiment will be updated with.
The properties associated with this instance.

InstanceListResult.description: The result of a request to list a resource.

value.description: The list of resources. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list.

InstancePermissions.description: The permissions that can be granted in an Instance.

appServiceCallers.description: The object ids to grant access to call instance app service.

InstancePermissionsTopLevelResourcePrope.description: The base properties of all Azure resource properties for top level resource types.

resourceConfiguration.description: A collection of configuration values that are available to consume in the resources.

securityGroupPermissions.description: The permissions granted to security groups.

servicePrincipalPermissions.description: The permissions granted to service principals.

InstancePermissionsTopLevelUpdatePropert.description: The definition of properties in a patch request.

resourceConfiguration.description: A collection of configuration values that are available to consume in the resources.

securityGroupPermissions.description: The permissions granted to security groups.

servicePrincipalPermissions.description: The permissions granted to service principals.

InstanceResourceProperties.description: The properties of an Instance resource.

apiTier.description: The app service sku needed for this instance's expected workload. This is the same value of "name" in "skuDescription" https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.web/serverfarms?tabs=json#SkuDescription. A list of possible values are in the Instance column in the pricing table https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/app-service/windows/#pricing.

sharedMachinePool.description: The shared machine pool used in the instance. The pool name is "Shared". An experiment in the instance can use this pool. If it's not specified, a default one is created.

azureMachineLearningStatus.description: Indicates Whether an Azure Machine Learning resource should be created in the instance.

hostname.description: The shared SSL Hostname for the instance, if any. Must only include root of hostname and it must be a subdomain of *.smltenant.microsoft.com.

authJwtAudiences.description: The audiences allowed to make requests for user based auth.

allowedIPs.description: The IP ranges (CIDR notation) allowed to access Key Vault, Storage Accounts, Azure Machine Learning and Container Registry.

trafficManager.description: The Traffic Manager resource associated with the Instance.

uniqueNameGeneration.description: Whether the resource name should be used as-is instead of generating a unique suffix.

InstanceUpdateProperties.description: The definition of properties for Instance patch requests.

apiTier.description: The app service sku needed for this instance's expected workload. This is the same value of "name" in "skuDescription" https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.web/serverfarms?tabs=json#SkuDescription. A list of possible values are in the Instance column in the pricing table https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/app-service/windows/#pricing.

sharedMachinePool.description: The shared machine pool used in the instance. The pool name is "Shared". An experiment in the instance can use this pool.

azureMachineLearningStatus.description: Indicates Whether an Azure Machine Learning resource should be created in the instance.

hostname.description: The shared SSL Hostname for the instance, if any. Must only include root of hostname and it must be a subdomain of *.smltenant.microsoft.com.

authJwtAudiences.description: The audiences allowed to make requests for user based auth.

allowedIPs.description: The IP ranges (CIDR notation) allowed to access Key Vault, Storage Accounts, Azure Machine Learning and Container Registry.

trafficManager.description: The Traffic Manager resource associated with the Instance.

InstanceUpdateRequest.description: A patch request definition to update an Instance.

properties.description: The properties the instance will be updated with.

MachinePool.description: The definition of a Batch VM Pool.

apps.description: The MachinePoolApp to install into the pool.

scale.description: The definition of the Scale strategy for a Batch VM Pool.

dedicatedNodeCount.description: The number of nodes to have in the VM Pool when configured to use Fixed scaling.

evaluationPeriodMinutes.description: The number of minutes to wait before evaluating the scaling formula when configured to use Auto scaling.

formula.description: The scaling formula to use when configured to use Auto scaling. Refer to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/batch/batch-automatic-scaling#write-an-autoscale-formula for how to write the formula.

mode.description: The kind of scaling the VM Pool to use.

values.description: Dynamic scaling will be done automatically based on a provided formula.
Static scaling will be fixed to a predetermined number of VMs.

vmOsType.description: The OS to be used in the Pool.

vmSize.description: The size of the VM to be used in the Pool. It follows the requirements of vmSize for the Azure Batch https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.batch/batchaccounts/pools?tabs=json. A list of possible vmSize can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/sizes. The available VM sizes depend on region and availability set.

maxTasksPerNode.description: The maximum number of parallel tasks to run on a node.

MachinePoolApp.description: The definition of a 3rd Party app that can be installed into a Batch VM Pool.

startTaskStatus.description: Indicates if this app contains a start task to include in the VM Pool.

packageLink.description: The path to the app package deployed to the machine pool. The package is compressed into a zip file.

NamedMachinePool.description: The definition of a Batch VM Pool that explicitly requires a name.

name.description: The name of the VM Pool.

ResourcePermissions.description: The permissions that can be granted in the resource.

blobContributors.description: The object ids to grant contributor access to public and internal blob data.

blobReaders.description: The object ids to grant read access to public and internal blob data.

secretsGetters.description: The object ids to grant access to get keyvault secrets.

Sandbox.description: The definition of an instance Sandbox.

properties.description: The properties associated with this Sandbox.

SandboxListResult.description: The result of a request to list a resource.

value.description: The list of resources. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list.

SandboxResourceProperties.description: The definition of properties of a Sandbox.

azureMachineLearningStatus.description: Indicates Whether an Azure Machine Learning resource should be created in the sandbox.

sharedMachinePool.description: The shared machine pool used in the instance. The pool name is "Shared". An experiment in the instance can use this pool. If it's not specified, a default one is created.

SandboxUpdateProperties.description: The definition of properties for Sandbox patch requests.

azureMachineLearningStatus.description: Indicates Whether an Azure Machine Learning resource should be created in the sandbox.

sharedMachinePool.description: The shared machine pool used in the instance. The pool name is "Shared". An experiment in the instance can use this pool. If it's not specified, a default one is created.

SandboxUpdateRequest.description: A patch request definition to update a Sandbox.

properties.description: The properties the Sandbox will be updated with.

TrafficManagerSettings.description: The definition of a Traffic Manager resource associated with an Instance.

endpointStatus.description: Whether the endpoint should be enabled at the completion of deployment.

name.description: The name of the associated Traffic Manager resource.

globalNameOverride.description: Override the default (Name) setting for the global auth AAD resource name for multi-TM scenarios.

resourceGroupName.description: The resource group name of the associated Traffic Manager resource.
